title: Teaching an old dog new tricks: Ti-doped ZnFe2O4 as active material in zinc ion batteries – a proof of concept
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2175-2185
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00134F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
S. Krämer, J. Hopster, A. Windmüller, R.-A. Eichel, M. Grünebaum, T. Jüstel, M. Winter, K. Neuhaus
ZnFe2O4 is a well-known photocatalyst with high electronic conductivity. This study shows that both the pure and slightly Ti-doped material are also zinc-ion conductors and can be used as active materials at the positive electrode in zinc batteries.
